description: This file defines a React component for a chat session page in a Next.js frontend. It manages session messages, user input, message sending, message display, and UI layout, including sidebars and upload functionality.

methods.name: ChatSessionPage
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the chat session interface, manages state, fetches data, handles message sending, and UI interactions.

methods.name: onUpload
methods.description: Uploads attached files using the uploadMaterial API call.

methods.name: onSend
methods.description: Handles sending of user message, optimistic UI update, and displaying assistant response.
